pages.title: Giant Panda
pages.text: The giant panda ($(o)Ailuropoda melanoleuca$()), also known as the panda bear ($(o)or simply the panda$()), is a bear species endemic to China.$(br2)It is characterised by its bold black-and-white coat and rotund body.

pages.title: Giant Panda
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Most active during Dawn/Dusk$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:bamboo$(br2)Number of Offspring: 1$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
